questionTitle: There's ________ milk in the fridge.
Kate and Jenny have a brother. ________ Bill.
________ was happy.
He took a note ________ of his pocket.
He's the man ________.
Is the Eiffel Tower taller ________ Big Ben?
________ Mr Brown's friends ever been here?
A train is ________ a bus.
John can fly ________ aeroplane.
He has been studying in the library every night ________ the last three months.
Jane said that you had read the book three times. Yes, I found it very ________ .
English is spoken all ________ the worl
Alan Clarke was an interesting man but sometimes he was a bit economical with the ________.
________ the moon last night?
Is Hun Hin ________ away from Bangkok than Pet Buri?
If you could take a trip to the moon, ________?
anwers: what are you going to do

questionTitle: She finally decided ________ her children alone in the house.
He seldom goes to the market, ________?
You have tea for breakfast, ________ you?
________ shall I do? You ought to consult your parents.
